descriptionHtml:
[img] http://livedoor.blogimg.jp/otyahanabi/imgs/5/4/5452d508.jpg [/img]

The mod adds a Khajiit merchant companion to the game. 
He is Non-aggressive, only able to carry your items.




He is very timid
[img] http://livedoor.blogimg.jp/otyahanabi/imgs/1/b/1b5d3402.jpg [/img]


[youtube]uCv6xdVMpRU[/youtube]


[b][color=#509b1e]Location:[/color][/b]
He can be found in Whiterun Khajiit caravan point
He is not a member of the caravan

[b][color=#509b1e]Installation:[/color][/b]
Extract the files
Move the Data folder to your Skyrim folder (Steam\\\\\\\\steamapps\\\\\\\\common\\\\\\\\skyrim)

[b][color=#509b1e]Uninstallation:[/color][/b]
Remove the file: ukc01.esp  ukc01.bsa

[b][color=#509b1e]Recommend Mod:[/color][/b]
This mod don\\\\\\\'t include khajiit texture.
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/5941] Cover Khajiit [/url]

[b][color=#509b1e]Change log:[/color][/b]
1.1 - None playable character

[b][color=#509b1e]Special Thanks:[/color][/b]
RAN46
author: Dragonporn
